Isolation of CD4 + T Cells and of Splenic DC and Cell Culture for T Cell Phenotype Differentiation

T cells were sorted for <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + <extra_id_0> CD62L <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> hi , <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + <extra_id_0> CD62L <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> hi <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - , or <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + <extra_id_0> CD44 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> lo <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - to > 98 % on a Moflo cytometer ( Cytomation ) as before ( Shoemaker etal . , 2006 ; Veldhoen etal . , 2009 ) .
T cells were sorted for CD4 + CD62L hi , CD4 + CD62L hi CD25 - , or CD4 + CD44 lo CD25 - to > 98 % on a Moflo cytometer ( Cytomation ) as before ( Shoemaker etal . , 2006 ; Veldhoen etal . , 2009 ) .
In most cases , experiments were reproduced with each type of purified <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + Tcell population with similar results obtained .
In most cases , experiments were reproduced with each type of purified CD4 + Tcell population with similar results obtained .
Splenic DCs were prepared as described ( Hosken etal . , 1995 ) , and sort purified <extra_id_0> CD11c <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + cells were added to the Tcell culture .
Splenic DCs were prepared as described ( Hosken etal . , 1995 ) , and sort purified CD11c + cells were added to the Tcell culture .

Purified DO11.10 <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + Tcells ( 1 x 105 cells / ml ) were cultured as before ( Hosken etal . , 1995 ) , in a total volume of 1 ml cRPMI medium in a 48-well plate , with splenic DCs ( 2 x 104 cells / ml ) , and varying amounts of <extra_id_0> OVA <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and of <extra_id_0> IL-12 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

Purified DO11.10 CD4 + Tcells ( 1 x 105 cells / ml ) were cultured as before ( Hosken etal . , 1995 ) , in a total volume of 1 ml cRPMI medium in a 48-well plate , with splenic DCs ( 2 x 104 cells / ml ) , and varying amounts of OVA and of IL-12 .

APC - independent differentiation of naive <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + Tcells into Th1 and Th2 cells used stimulation with anti - <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and anti - <extra_id_0> CD28 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and appropriate cytokine conditions , and control Th1 and Th2 cells were cultured as described before ( Hosken etal . , 1995 ; Shoemaker etal . , 2006 ) .

APC - independent differentiation of naive CD4 + Tcells into Th1 and Th2 cells used stimulation with anti - CD3 and anti - CD28 and appropriate cytokine conditions , and control Th1 and Th2 cells were cultured as described before ( Hosken etal . , 1995 ; Shoemaker etal . , 2006 ) .
Culture conditions for Th17 cells were as described before ( Veldhoen etal . , 2006 ) .
Culture conditions for Th17 cells were as described before ( Veldhoen etal . , 2006 ) .

Importantly , Th1 and Th2 cells could be differentiated in cRPMI or IMDM ( Hosken etal . , 1995 ; Shoemaker etal . , 2006 ; Veldhoen etal . , 2006 ) , but Th17 cells were only differentiated optimally in IMDM ( Veldhoen etal . , 2009 ) .
